flavor: Light up, flame out, and burn it all down.
stripped_text: The first time each turn a run becomes successful after a subroutine resolved during that run, gain 1 credit and the Corp trashes 1 card from HQ.
stripped_title: Ryo "Phoenix" Ono: Out of the Ashes
text: The first time each turn a run becomes successful after a subroutine resolved during that run, gain 1[credit] and the Corp trashes 1 card from HQ.
title: Ryō “Phoenix” Ōno: Out of the Ashes

flavor: Whatever it takes for us to survive.
stripped_text: Once per turn -> click: Install 1 card from your grip, paying 2 credits less. When you install that card, suffer 1 meat damage.
text: Once per turn → [click]: Install 1 card from your grip, paying 2[credit] less. When you install that card, suffer 1 meat damage.
title: Topan: Ormas Leader

flavor: The volume is the message.
stripped_text: Run any server. The first time the Corp would end that run, prevent the run from ending unless the Corp reveals and trashes X cards from HQ at random. X is equal to the number of cards in the root of the attacked server.
text: Run any server. The first time the Corp would end that run, prevent the run from ending unless the Corp reveals and trashes X cards from HQ at random. X is equal to the number of cards in the root of the attacked server.
title: Shred

flavor: The waters begin to roil, and bit by bit they swell.
stripped_text: This program gets +1 strength for each fracter in your heap. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.
text: This program gets +1 strength for each fracter in your heap. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
title: Rising Tide

flavor: Try me.
stripped_text: Whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice, you may install 1 resource or piece of hardware from your grip.
text: Whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice, you may install 1 resource or piece of hardware from your grip.
title: Barry “Baz” Wong: Tri-Maf Veteran

flavor: Peer pressure works.
stripped_text: When your turn begins, look at the top card of your stack. If that card is an icebreaker or a run event, you may reveal it and add it to your grip.
text: When your turn begins, look at the top card of your stack. If that card is an icebreaker or a run event, you may reveal it and add it to your grip.
title: MuslihaT: Multifarious Marketeer

flavor:
“…one-hundred and twenty-seven rounds fired, and two police hoppers totaled. Miraculously, no officers were hurt, though the suspect remains at large.”
—Abdul el-Sattar, KKN 6
stripped_text: Run any server. If successful, gain 6 credits.
text: Run any server. If successful, gain 6[credit].
title: Clean Getaway

flavor:
Who else will teach the stories of good and evil?
We can’t leave the corps’ dirty deeds in the shadows.
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run, if your  mu is full, you may flip this identity and gain 1 credit. Flip side: Whenever you make a successful run, if you have at least 1 unused  mu, you may flip this identity and draw 1 card.
text:
Whenever you make a successful run, if your [mu] is full, you may flip this identity and gain 1[credit].
Flip side:
Whenever you make a successful run, if you have at least 1 unused [mu], you may flip this identity and draw 1 card.
title: Dewi Subrotoputri: Pedagogical Dhalang

flavor: Good design is invisible—but I’ll never settle for ‘good’.
stripped_text: Whenever you discard cards to reach your maximum hand size, you may install 1 program or piece of hardware from among those cards.
text: Whenever you discard cards to reach your maximum hand size, you may install 1 program or piece of hardware from among those cards.
title: Magdalene Keino-Chemutai: Cryptarchitect

flavor: “Won’t she get in trouble for putting that in the show? And how did she even find out?!”
stripped_text: Run R&D. If successful, install up to 3 cards from your grip (one at a time), paying 1 credit less for each.
text: Run R&D. If successful, install up to 3 cards from your grip (one at a time), paying 1[credit] less for each.
title: Illumination

stripped_text: When you install this hardware and when your turn begins, you may host this hardware on an installed non-AI icebreaker. Host icebreaker gets +1 strength. Abilities that increase its strength last for the remainder of the run (instead of any shorter duration).
text: When you install this hardware and when your turn begins, you may host this hardware on an installed non-AI icebreaker. Host icebreaker gets +1 strength. Abilities that increase its strength last for the remainder of the run (instead of any shorter duration).
title: GAMEDRAGON™ Pro

stripped_text: click: Host any number of programs from your grip faceup on this hardware. (They are not installed.) Once per turn -> 0 credits: Install 1 hosted program (paying its install cost). Limit 1 console per player.
text: [click]: Host any number of programs from your grip faceup on this hardware. (They are not installed.) Once per turn → 0[credit]: Install 1 hosted program (paying its install cost). Limit 1 console per player.
title: Madani

flavor: There are a hundred currencies in the undercity, and Knickknack takes them all. Creds and rupiah get you noodles. For his secret menu, he’ll take your burnt-out rigs, your sterilized virii. But to taste his smoked vatchicken stew, bring him what he values most: your story.
stripped_text: The first time each turn a run begins, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, gain credits equal to its printed install cost and draw 1 card.
text: The first time each turn a run begins, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, gain credits equal to its printed install cost and draw 1 card.
title: “Knickknack” O’Brian

flavor:
“They were fast, friendly, and efficient. ★★★★☆.”
—satisfied customer
stripped_text: When you install this resource and whenever a run begins, place 1 credit on this resource. When there are 6 or more hosted credits, take all credits from this resource, trash it, and draw 1 card.
text:
When you install this resource and whenever a run begins, place 1[credit] on this resource.
When there are 6 or more hosted credits, take all credits from this resource, trash it, and draw 1 card.
title: Side Hustle

flavor: Workers of the World, Delivered.
stripped_text: Once per turn -> Trash 1 rezzed bioroid card in the root of or protecting the attacked server: End the run.
text: Once per turn → Trash 1 rezzed bioroid card in the root of or protecting the attacked server: End the run.
title: LEO Construction: Labor Solutions

flavor: Fashion fades. Poétrï is eternal.
stripped_text: Whenever you score an agenda, look at the top 3 cards of R&D. You may install 1 non-agenda card from among them. Whenever an agenda is stolen, you may install 1 non-agenda card from HQ.
stripped_title: Poetri Luxury Brands: All the Rage
text:
Whenever you score an agenda, look at the top 3 cards of R&D. You may install 1 non-agenda card from among them.
Whenever an agenda is stolen, you may install 1 non-agenda card from HQ.
title: Poétrï Luxury Brands: All the Rage

flavor: “Deploying in T-minus 5…”
stripped_text: click click click, trash: Gain 4 credits and draw 3 cards. Install up to 2 cards from HQ (one at a time). You may play 1 operation from HQ.
text: [click][click][click], [trash]: Gain 4[credit] and draw 3 cards. Install up to 2 cards from HQ (one at a time). You may play 1 operation from HQ.
title: Humanoid Resources

flavor: “Don’t be scared of the Ottos, kiddo. They’re building our future!”
stripped_text: When you rez this asset, load 6 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it and gain click click. When your turn begins, take 2 credits from this asset.
text:
When you rez this asset, load 6[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it and gain [click][click].
When your turn begins, take 2[credit] from this asset.
title: Otto Campaign

flavor:
“I am a very reasonable manager. I do not expect my staff to do anything I could not do.”
—Bass CH1R180G4
stripped_text: Gain click click.
text: Gain [click][click].
title: Nanomanagement

flavor:
“The instability of human braintapes is directly proportional to the number of limbs on a given bioroid, so we’ve begun phasing them out for something better-equipped. A human braintape could be working beside an octopus for weeks and never have an inkling.”
—Maía Mínervudóttir, R&D
stripped_text: Draw 2 cards. Install up to 2 cards from HQ (one at a time).
text: Draw 2 cards. Install up to 2 cards from HQ (one at a time).
title: Top-Down Solutions

stripped_text: Whenever you do damage or trash 1 or more cards from HQ, place 1 power counter on this identity. When your turn begins, you may remove 2 hosted power counters to look at the top 3 cards of R&D. Trash 1 of those cards and add the rest to HQ.
stripped_title: AU Co.: The Gold Standard in Clones
text:
Whenever you do damage or trash 1 or more cards from HQ, place 1 power counter on this identity.
When your turn begins, you may remove 2 hosted power counters to look at the top 3 cards of R&D. Trash 1 of those cards and add the rest to HQ.
title: AU Co.: The Gold Standard in Clones

flavor: The Looming Future.
stripped_text: When your discard phase ends, if there are 3 or fewer cards in HQ, you may pay 1 credit to place 1 advancement counter on an unrezzed card you can advance. (You cannot score that card this turn.)
text: When your discard phase ends, if there are 3 or fewer cards in HQ, you may pay 1[credit] to place 1 advancement counter on an unrezzed card you can advance. (You cannot score that card this turn.)
title: PT Untaian: Life's Building Blocks

flavor: Spring-loaded minds, kept in suspension to be launched into the net at any incursion.
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner approaches a piece of ice protecting this server, you may trash this upgrade. If you do, gain 3 credits and you may swap the ice being approached with a piece of ice from Archives or HQ.
text: Whenever the Runner approaches a piece of ice protecting this server, you may trash this upgrade. If you do, gain 3[credit] and you may swap the ice being approached with a piece of ice from Archives or HQ.
title: Mitra Aman

flavor:
Igniting your potential.
Never stop shining.
stripped_text: When your action phase ends, if you played an operation this turn, gain 1 credit and flip this identity. Flip side: The first time each turn you play an operation, gain click. When the Runner makes a successful run on HQ or R&D, flip this identity.
text:
When your action phase ends, if you played an operation this turn, gain 1[credit] and flip this identity.
Flip side:
The first time each turn you play an operation, gain [click].
When the Runner makes a successful run on HQ or R&D, flip this identity.
title: Nebula Talent Management: Making Stars

flavor: Every Impulse Monitored.
stripped_text: The first time each turn a tag is removed, you may reveal and install 1 card from HQ, ignoring all costs. click, remove 1 tag: Gain 2 credits.
text: The first time each turn a tag is removed, you may reveal and install 1 card from HQ, ignoring all costs. [click], remove 1 tag: Gain 2[credit].
title: Synapse Global: Faster than Thought

flavor: That’s so fifteen minutes ago.
stripped_text: When this agenda is scored or stolen, place 1 agenda counter on it. click, hosted agenda counter: Draw 4 cards. Shuffle any number of cards from HQ into R&D. The Corp can use this ability even if this agenda is in the Runner's score area.
text: When this agenda is scored or stolen, place 1 agenda counter on it. [click], hosted agenda counter: Draw 4 cards. Shuffle any number of cards from HQ into R&D. The Corp can use this ability even if this agenda is in the Runner's score area.
title: Next Big Thing

flavor:
They know what makes you tick.
And ticked-off.
stripped_text: Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag. Subroutine Do 1 net damage. Subroutine Do 2 net damage if the Runner has at least 2 tags.
text:
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage if the Runner has at least 2 tags.
title: Doomscroll

flavor: “I believe you have something of ours.”
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, remove X tags. Install 1 agenda from the Runner's score area with a printed agenda point value equal to X. If the Runner is still tagged, place 1 advancement counter on that agenda.
text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, remove X tags.
Install 1 agenda from the Runner’s score area with a printed agenda point value equal to X. If the Runner is still tagged, place 1 advancement counter on that agenda.
title: IP Enforcement

flavor: “Your Star Power is in the toilet, kid. We need a fresh face.”
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Place 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card you can advance. If you do, choose a card type and reveal the grip. Choose up to 2 revealed cards of that type. The Runner shuffles those cards into the stack.
text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Place 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card you can advance. If you do, choose a card type and reveal the grip. Choose up to 2 revealed cards of that type. The Runner shuffles those cards into the stack.
title: Touch-ups

flavor: We’ll be there.
stripped_text: You may install agendas faceup. (This does not make their abilities active.) Whenever the Runner accesses a faceup installed agenda, do 2 meat damage and give the Runner 1 tag.
text: You may install agendas faceup. (This does not make their abilities active.) Whenever the Runner accesses a faceup installed agenda, do 2 meat damage and give the Runner 1 tag.
title: BANGUN: When Disaster Strikes

flavor: Action at a distance.
stripped_text: The first time each turn you gain credits through an ability on an agenda or operation, you may draw 1 card.
text: The first time each turn you gain credits through an ability on an agenda or operation, you may draw 1 card.
title: The Zwicky Group: Invisible Hands

flavor:
“If you lived here, you’d be at work by now!”
—Weyland recruiter
stripped_text: When you rez this asset, load 8 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. When your turn begins, take 4 credits from this asset and draw 1 card.
text:
When you rez this asset, load 8[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it.
When your turn begins, take 4[credit] from this asset and draw 1 card.
title: Anthill Excavation Contract

flavor: “Rejoice, executives! The Net has sent unto us a profit!”
stripped_text: As an additional cost to rez this asset, forfeit 1 agenda or reveal and trash 3 cards from HQ. When your turn begins, you may play 1 transaction operation from Archives. After it resolves, remove it from the game.
text: As an additional cost to rez this asset, forfeit 1 agenda or reveal and trash 3 cards from HQ. When your turn begins, you may play 1 transaction operation from Archives. After it resolves, remove it from the game.
title: Plutus

flavor:
“The detritus of failed incursions accumulates. Instead of sweeping it all away, the parsimonious sysop should nudge this debris into defensive positions in the server’s metagravity well.”
—Moira Virtue, Ice Engineering, KKU
stripped_text: The Runner cannot trash this ice (while it is rezzed). Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run.
text: The Runner cannot trash this ice (while it is rezzed). [subroutine] End the run. [subroutine] End the run.
title: Kessleroid

stripped_text: You can advance this ice. When the Runner encounters this ice, if it has 3 or more hosted advancement counters, you may place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance. Subroutine You may place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance. Subroutine The Runner loses 2 credits. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.
text:
You can advance this ice.
When the Runner encounters this ice, if it has 3 or more hosted advancement counters, you may place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance.
[subroutine] You may place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance.
[subroutine] The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
title: Syailendra

flavor: Designed by 2023 World Champion William “Sokka” Huang
stripped_text: Resolve 2 of the following in any order: * Draw 1 card. Shuffle 1 card from HQ into R&D. * Install 1 piece of ice from HQ, ignoring all costs. * Place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance. * Gain 2 credits.
text:
Resolve 2 of the following in any order:
  • Draw 1 card. Shuffle 1 card from HQ into R&D.
  • Install 1 piece of ice from HQ, ignoring all costs.
  • Place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance.
  • Gain 2[credit].
title: Key Performance Indicators

flavor:
“We would like to reassure our shareholders that none of the buildings damaged in the blast were owned by Weyland Consortium subsidiaries…”
—Luana Campos, Weyland spokesperson
stripped_text: Play only if the threat level is 4 or greater, and only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn. Do 4 meat damage unless the Runner pays 8 credits.
text:
Play only if the threat level is 4 or greater, and only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn.
Do 4 meat damage unless the Runner pays 8[credit].
title: Measured Response

flavor: Stop that.
stripped_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, purge virus counters. Subroutine End the run.
text:
When you rez this ice during a run against this server, purge virus counters.
[subroutine] End the run.
title: Flyswatter

stripped_text: 2 recurring credits (When you rez this upgrade and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to rez assets in the root of this server and ice protecting this server. Persistent -> The trash cost of each asset in the root of this server is increased by 2 credits. Limit 1 region per server.
text: 2[recurring-credit] (When you rez this upgrade and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to rez assets in the root of this server and ice protecting this server. Persistent → The trash cost of each asset in the root of this server is increased by 2[credit]. Limit 1 region per server.
title: Mahkota Langit Grid
